name: Perspectives (thisismyapple)
description:
Perspective is everything. Metaphorically or physically. This game uses perspective for 7 puzzles you must solve. Some are challenging and some are easy, there are tricks and you must be precise. You cannot move backward, you can only move forward, and in most of the puzzles you must use all of the camera angles.

The definition for chaos is "complete disorder and confusion" according to Google so I thought puzzle game.
